meta.title: AdBlock Tester: test your AdBlock extensions
meta.description: Website with ads, analytics trackers, metrics, error catchers. Check your blocker: AdBlock, AdBlock Plus, AdGuard, Ghostery, uBlock Origin, AdBlocker Ultimate‚Ä¶

page.title: AdBlock Tester
page.warning: Using multiple ad blockers at the same time can negatively affect their work.
page.description:
Choosing an ad blocker but don't know where to test it? This site contains various advertising and analytic services you can use to test the effectiveness of your Adblocker. Some examples of Adblockers you can test are:
AdBlock, AdBlock Plus, AdGuard, Ghostery, uBlock Origin, AdBlocker Ultimate and others.
page.keywords: Website with ads, analytics trackers, metrics, error catchers. Check your blocker: AdBlock, AdBlock Plus, AdGuard, Ghostery, uBlock Origin, AdBlocker Ultimate‚Ä¶
page.footerQuestion: Hey, I'm glad you've got so far. English isn't my first language, so I'd really appreciate your letting me know if you come across any words that are misspelled on this site. Also I'm open for your ideas about new services.

script.unknown: possibly due to service security settings
script.likelyBlocked: file size does not match the original or takes a long time to load
script.likelyUnblocked: file size is within the normal range, it is more likely that the file is original

localLoading.likelyBlocked: file size does not match the original or takes a long time to load

context.title: Contextual advertising
context.description: This is the most common form of advertising and tracking on the internet. It‚Äôs very easy for website owners to set up. These services collect data about you in order to find the right advertisement for you.

banners.title: Banner advertising
banners.description: This type of advertising is often used on large websites that sell ad space. It is difficult to block because it is difficult to distinguish between an advertising image and a regular image. Often the rules are written for each site separately, so this check is not entirely accurate. It only checks for the presence of keywords in the file path and the availability of Flash.

analytics.title: Analytics Tools
analytics.description: These services monitor your actions on the site and collect information about you. They are only useful to the sites' owners. Unfortunately, blocking them sometimes can completely break the site.

errorCatchers.title: Error Monitoring
errorCatchers.description: Unlike analytics tools, these services are used to track and measure errors on websites. Services monitor almost all user actions so that the error message is as complete as possible. Most often, if you turn these off, nothing will break.

sizeQuestion.description: Ad unit is not empty. Unfortunately, we can‚Äôt determine whether an ad is showing there or is it an empty block from your blocker. For an accurate final result, please specify what you see.
